items.sentence: We were expecting Tom to be at the party, but he didn\'t show up.
Before working here, Tom was a police officer for thirteen years.
Before you can love others, you need to be able to love yourself.
Can you imagine what our lives would be like without electricity?
I heard that Mary was sick all last week, but she looks well now.
It\'s a shame we weren\'t able to get to know one another better.
A person\'s way of looking at something depends on his situation.
Even though Tom is only sixteen, he looks like he\'s over twenty.
I think it wouldn\'t be too hard to come up with a better system.
Tom isn\'t the kind of person who blames others for his mistakes.
